Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.controllers

Class ReservationsAdminController

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.controllers.ReservationsAdminController
@Controller public class ReservationsAdminController extends Object
This class is responsible for managing reservations on the admin side of the hotel website. It provides functionality to view, update, and delete reservations. ReservationsAdminController handles operations related to managing reservations, such as listing all reservations, updating reservation details, and deleting reservations. It interacts with services and repositories to perform CRUD operations on reservation entities. The class ensures that only authenticated administrators can access the reservation management functionality. ReservationsAdminController is essential for maintaining the integrity and accuracy of reservation data in the system.
Author:
Team ABCFG

  • Method Details

    • checkedOut

      @GetMapping("/reservationsAdmin/list") public String checkedOut(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves all reservations for display on the admin side. Redirects to the login page if the session does not contain an admin.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which reservation details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing the admin user
      Returns:
      the view name for displaying the list of reservations

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/reservationsAdmin/edit/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the form for updating a specific reservation. Redirects to the login page if the session does not contain an admin.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the reservation to update
      model - the model to which reservation details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing the admin user
      Returns:
      the view name for updating the reservation

    • updateReservationsAdmin

      @PostMapping("/updateReservationsAdmin/update/{id}") public String updateReservationsAdmin(@PathVariable int id, @ModelAttribute("dates") RoomReservationDates dates, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates the reservation with the specified ID. Redirects to the login page if the session does not contain an admin.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the reservation to update
      dates - the updated reservation dates
      result - the binding result for form validation
      model - the model to which updated reservation details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing the admin user
      Returns:
      the view name for redirecting to the list of reservations after updating

    • deleteRoom

      @GetMapping("/updateReservationsAdmin/delete/{id}") public String deleteRoom(@PathVariable int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Deletes the room reservation with the specified ID. Redirects to the login page if the session does not contain an admin.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the reservation to delete
      model - the model to which reservation details will be added
      session - the HTTP session containing the admin user
      Returns:
      the view name for redirecting to the list of reservations after deletion
